original_text: The Lord was as an enemy: he hath swallowed up Israel, he hath swallowed up all her palaces: he hath destroyed his strong holds, and hath increased in the daughter of Judah mourning and lamentation.
korean_text: 주께서 원수 같이 되어 이스라엘을 삼키셨음이여 그 모든 궁궐들을 삼키셨고 견고한 성들을 무너뜨리사 딸 유다에 근심과 애통을 더하셨도다

sentences.original_text: The Lord was as an enemy:
he hath swallowed up all her palaces:
he hath destroyed his strong holds,
and hath increased in the daughter of Judah
